short_summary: M1 Milliohm Meter kit with Green display
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 14 July 2023 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
### Multi-Million Meter Tender

**Reference Number**
WS4027589933

**Publication Date**
2023-06-07

**Tender Closing Date**
2023-07-14T14:00:00 EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of M1 Milliohm Meter Kit with Green display.

**Supply Requirements**

* M1 Milliohm Meter Kits with Green displays

**Bid Submission Details**

* All required documentation and bids must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery (http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16419880) by 14:00 EST on July 14, 2023.
* Late bids received after 14:00 EST will not be considered.

**Notice Type**
Competitive bidding for a procurement award

**Selection Criteria**
Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements**
The contract will be subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA).

**Regions of Delivery**
The selected contractor must be able to deliver the M1 Milliohm Meter Kits to the following locations: Ottawa, Ontario.

**Tender Contact**

GEORGE-MADHU, Annie (SPAC/PSPC)
annie.george-madhu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

The formatting adheres to markdown for convenience readability.
